SearchReviews.com Widgets

Inline and modal widgets for search engine startup

SearchReviews.com is a search engine for product reviews. The widgets I built for them let any website owner serve product reviews from SearchReviews.com's database on his or her own website. I handled everything from the Javascript for the widgets to the design and implementation of the widget buttons and displays.

The widgets automatically detect the product for which to show reviews - or the website owner can also set the product manually. For the Inline Widget, I also built in the ability for website owners to customize the look of the widget - size, colors, font, etc.

Both widgets are also built to provide SEO benefit back to SearchReviews.com whenever they are used.

SearchReviews.com Widgets are built with Javascript.
